sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"引用，复述"之意。
means: cite ： 指引经据典以示证明或凭据。
quote ： 指不加剪裁的直接引用原文或原话。
repeat ： 仅强调口头或笔头重复别人的话或字句，并不必指明出处。

sentence.Network_en: Nearly 60% of our bookings come from repeat business and personal recommendation.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们近60%的订单来自于回头客和熟人介绍。

sentence.Network_en: What price a glorious repeat of last week's triumph?
sentence.Network_cn: 还有可能再次上演上周的辉煌胜利吗？

sentence.Network_en: I'll repeat that so you can commit it to memory.
sentence.Network_cn: 我会重复一下，好让你们记住。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ·事实错误：在一些场合中，无线电对讲使用了“重复”（repeat）。实际上在海军部队里，在无线电通信中用到“重复”这个单词，仅仅限于和炮兵连对话时，要求对方重复说一次.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French repeter, from Latin repetere, from re- 'back' + petere 'seek'

entry.def: If you repeat something, you say or write it again. You can say I repeat to show that you feel strongly about what you are repeating.

example.ex: He repeated that he had been misquoted...
example.tran: 他反复说他的话被错误引用了。

example.ex: I repeat that medicine is on the brink of a revolution...
example.tran: 我要再次强调，医学面临着变革。

entry.def: If you repeat something that someone else has said or written, you say or write the same thing, or tell it to another person.

example.ex: She had an irritating habit of repeating everything I said to her...
example.tran: 她有个惹人讨厌的习惯，我跟她说的每一件事她都告诉别人。

example.ex: I trust you not to repeat that to anyone else...
example.tran: 我相信你不会把我的话告诉别人。

entry.def: If you repeat yourself, you say something which you have said before, usually by mistake.

example.ex: Then he started rambling and repeating himself.
example.tran: 他接下来就开始不着边际、说话来回重复了。

entry.def: People sometimes say repeat before saying again a word they have just said, in order to emphasize it or to make sure that people hear it.

example.ex: We are not, I repeat, not actually in the negotiating process...
example.tran: 我们不是，我重申一下，实际上不是在进行谈判。

example.ex: Find and destroy, repeat destroy, these units.
example.tran: 找到并且销毁，重复一下，销毁这些部件。

entry.def: If you repeat an action, you do it again.

example.ex: The next day I repeated the procedure...
example.tran: 第二天我重复了这个程序。

example.ex: He said Japan would never repeat its mistakes...
example.tran: 他说日本永远不会再犯同样的错误。

entry.def: If an event or series of events repeats itself, it happens again.

example.ex: The UN will have to work hard to stop history repeating itself...
example.tran: 联合国必须努力避免历史重演。

entry.tran: (通常指令人不快的事件的)再次发生
entry.def: If there is a repeat of an event, usually an undesirable event, it happens again.

example.ex: There were fears that there might be a repeat of last year's campaign of strikes.
example.tran: 有人担心去年的罢工运动可能再次重演。

example.ex: ...in order to prevent a repeat tragedy.
example.tran: 为了防止悲剧的再次发生

entry.def: If a company gets repeat business or repeat customers, people who have bought their goods or services before buy them again.

example.ex: Nearly 60% of our bookings come from repeat business and personal recommendation.
example.tran: 我们近60%的订单来自于回头客和熟人介绍。

entry.def: A repeat is a television or radio programme that has been broadcast before.

example.ex: There's nothing except sport and repeats on TV.
example.tran: 除了体育节目和重播节目外，电视上没什么新鲜内容。

entry.tran: （通常指令人不快的事件的）再次出现，再次发生
entry.def: If there is a repeat performance of something, usually something undesirable, it happens again.

example.ex: This year can only see a repeat performance of the decline.

sentences.sentence: "the events today were a repeat of yesterday's"

means.word_mean: 1. to say, state, or perform again;
2. make or do or perform again;

sentences.sentence: "He could never replicate his brilliant performance of the magic trick"
"followers echoing the cries of their leaders"
"They would like to take it over again"

means.word_mean: 6. repeat an earlier theme of a composition

auth_sentence.content: Repeat the process until the batter is used up.
auth_sentence.res_content: Repeat the process until the batter is used up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Repeat the process until the batter is used up.

auth_sentence.content: Repeat the layering, ending with a frittata wedge.
auth_sentence.res_content: Repeat the layering, ending with a frittata wedge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Repeat the layering, ending with a frittata wedge.

auth_sentence.content: He also wants a greater emphasis on repeat scans.
auth_sentence.res_content: He also wants a greater emphasis on repeat scans.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He also wants a greater emphasis on repeat scans.

stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+peat追求,寻求→重复追求→重复, 反复

Sentence.sentence: They're willing to do the hard work of identifying their valuable skills; be creative about where and how to look; learn how to present themselves to potential employers; and keep going, even after repeated rejections.
Disputes were characterized by intense verbal ( 言语上的) aggression, tended to be repeated and not resolved and made men, more than women, extremely angry.
You've now heard it so many times, you can probably repeat it in your sleep.
After repeating the question, she explained that the sufficient number of security guards would be working at peak hours to speed things along
The number of times of repeating the process

sentences.cn: 那孩子又问了一遍他的问题。

sentences.en: I repeat that we cannot undertake the task.
sentences.cn: 我再说一遍, 我们不能承担这项任务。

sentences.en: The children repeated the words after her in chorus.
sentences.cn: 孩子们跟她齐声朗读单词。
请把我说的话重复一遍。

sentences.en: We regret that we cannot repeat this article.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉, 我们无法再次供应此物。

sentences.en: The medicine repeats even after one has drunk many glasses of water.
sentences.cn: 吃过这种药后, 即使多喝几杯水, 嘴里仍然有药味。

means.word_mean: 重复; 复述; 背诵

sentences.en: I'm tired of seeing all these repeats on television.
sentences.cn: 那些重复的电视节目我都看腻了。

sentences.en: There will be a repeat of this programme next week.
sentences.cn: 下星期将重播这个节目。

jushi.english: The medicine repeats even after one has drunk many glasses of water.
jushi.chinese: 吃过这种药后,即使多喝几杯水,嘴里仍然有药味。
